definition: having no elements in common, become separated, disconnected or disjoint
details:
adjective
- having no elements in common
verb
- become separated, disconnected or disjoint
= synonyms: disjoin
- make disjoint, separated, or disconnected
= synonyms: disjoin
- separate at the joints
= example: separate at the joints
= synonyms: disarticulate
- part
= synonyms: divorce
